com.jenzz.materialpreference.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Prevents the pink boxes indicating 'hints' in the form of reveals or show errors.

com.jenzz.materialpreference.CheckBoxPre.android:title: Snap to Current Word

com.jenzz.materialpreference.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Shows the number of letters in the answer on the clue line
